ARABIC: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and said to his father and his people, 'What are you worshipping
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When he said to his father and his people: "What is this you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and said to his father and his people: “Whom do you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and asked his father and his people, "What is that you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When he said to his father (paternal uncle) and his people, “What do you worship?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When he said to his father and to his people: "What is it that which you worship"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When he said to his father and his people: What is it that you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when he said to his father and his folk, 'What do you serve?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When he said unto his father and his folk: What is it that ye worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Behold!" he said to his father and to his people, "What are these that you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Recall what time he said Unto his father and his people: What is it that ye worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When he said to his father and his people, ‘What is it that you are worshiping?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold! he said to his father and to his people, "What is that which ye worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When he said to his father and to his people: "What is it that which you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and when he said to his father and to his nation: 'What do you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said to his father and his people, “What are you worshiping?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:85] when he said, [while still] in this continuous state of his, to his father and his folk, in reproach: ‘What do — what is it that — you worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When he said unto his father) Azar (and his folk) the idol worshippers: (What is it that you worship) beside Allah?
